content.description:
This is a great line -- located on an obvious roof as you follow the boulders at the base of the cliffband.

Start on a lefthand crimp and right hand sloper, and head into a matched undercling & out the roof.
content.location:
This is near

Laundry Day

on the same boulder. From parking/campsite, walk towards the Cro Magnum headwall, and stay at the base. Just past the tall, bolted boulder at the base, you'll find a triangular roof with both climbs.

content.description:
This goes through the same roof as

Clay Pigeons

. Start

Clay Pigeons

, but climb out right side of roof through crazy compression of slopey holds. Set up for a huge move to a positive flat hold.
content.location: It is on the Clay Pigeons Boulder.

content.description: Start on slopey gaston and ledge. Move up to a right sidepull, and finish with big, left hand throw to a mini-jug.
content.location:
This is behind the

Clay Pigeons

roof on the same boulder. From parking/campsite, walk towards the Cro Magnum headwall, and stay at the base. Just past the tall, bolted boulder at the base, you'll find a triangular roof with both climbs.
